data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karanovic, Ivana, Soh, Ho-Young (2015): Five Sarsiellidae ostracods (Crustacea: Myodocopida) from the South Coast of Korea (East China Sea). Zootaxa 3947 (4): 451-488, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3947.4.1
